title: Flipped Learning-Based Science Inquiry Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level science fundamentals and mobile device proficiency
context.additional_context: A program for job seekers to develop self-directed learning competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can self-directively explain three or more science concepts using digital materials provided in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can collaborate with peers to perform and provide feedback on science problem-solving processes at least twice via a mobile microlearning platform.
Learners can accurately diagnose 80% or more of their learning gaps based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
